description: Try our easy to follow Sticky Soy-glazed Drumsticks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken drumsticks,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Sticky Soy-glazed Drumsticks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put the drumsticks on a board and make 4 deep slashes in each one along the thick part of the meat, cutting down to the bone on both sides.
In a large bowl mix together the honey, oil, soy sauce, tomato purée and mustard. Toss the drumsticks in the glaze, turning to cover the meat well.

Transfer the drumsticks to a roasting tin and roast in the top of a preheated oven, 220°C for 20-25 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through. Garnish with parsley and serve with boiled rice and a salad, if liked.
